name: Tomb of Chronos
description:
This game is my entry for the Brackeys 2020.2 Gamejam. 

Since the theme of the jam was "rewind", I decided to make a topdown puzzle game where you have to constantly shift through time to make your way through the challenges and puzzles.

You play as MAX, the worlds greatest treasure hunter of all time! He graduated in Archeology at  Oxford Universisty when he was 23 and now he is 70 years old! This adventure is going to be his last before his retirement, so make it count! :D

The Tomb has a device that can teleport you, and whatever you have with you, to one thousand years in the past.

Controlls:

WASD to walk, 

HOLD space to pickup, and release it to drop things

Q to interact with things/timetravel/read plates

In the downleft corner there is a RETRY button in case you die or get stuck.

In case you can't figure out what to do, I am going to upload a file that contains the answers to every level.
